EmailTemplate.description: Email to notify the field that their request is below the threshold - non-Pricing Strategy
EmailTemplate.name: WRF <24k non-Pricing Strategy
EmailTemplate.subject: WRF Unable to Process: {!Case.Subject}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Case.WRF_Requestor_Name__c},
Thank you for your Work Request submission for {!Case.Account}.
Unfortunately, this particular request falls under the threshold for us to assign an analyst.
Please utilize the Bid Builder tool, which can be found at the following link:
http://sp.na.odcorp.net/sites/BSG/FWR/default.aspx
Select "Excel Lists and Bid Builder", then "Fill out this Form".
Thank you,
BSD BIDS
